Key Match Events: The Celtics outscored the Nuggets by a 60-46 margin in the paint
Russell Westbrook had 26 points for Denver and eight turnovers
Christian Braun followed with a 3-pointer to tie it at 93
Boston went on a 15-0 run to help cement the win
Pre-Game Insights: Nikola Jokic sat out because of an illness
Aaron Gordon was also missing due to a calf injury
Post-Match Reflections: Stellar defense down the stretch, including steals from Al Horford and Tatum
The bench had a solid showing with Julian Strawther scoring 19 and Peyton Watson 14
Miscellaneous Highlights: There was a momentary break with 8:56 remaining when a cup of ice spilled on the court
The game between the last two NBA champions was setting up to feature two of the top players in the league
Others: The Nuggets dropped to 10-7 at home, they were 33-8 last season
The Celtics attempted 35 3-pointers, which was well below their season average of 50.17
There were 10 lead changes and eight ties
